name: Mr. Tennis's Hustle
description:
This was made for ScoreSpace Jam 11, but there was a build error, so I didn't get to finish it til 4 months later lol

Controls

LClick - Swing + Toss ball + Assault

RClick - Pickup + Drop ball

WASD - Move

Shift - Sprint

Space - Ragdoll

Escape - Quit (during match)

Hover quadrant - Teleport

Instructions:

Mr. Tennis has quadruple-booked himself 4 tennis matches - simultaneously. For each game he wins, the sponsors will give him more money. But for each one he loses, they'll take away funds.

You'll also get a bonus for matches you win, depending on how fast you win - the sponsors love a show of dominance!

Playing 4 matches at once is hard, so you'll have to play a lil dirty - smack your foes and the ballboy to give yourself some time!

But don't neglect your matches - if you stall and don't serve, they'll give the opponent a point.

See how much money you can make!

Credits:

Imon, Alex, Cam, Ethan
